text:
Wow:

Nancy Pelosi just said on MSNBC that Trump should “follow the science” and avoid large gatherings like rallies

Just weeks ago she was marching in a massive protest with BLM activists

So I guess that’s okay but Trump rallies aren’t?

🤔
